  "title": "Electrical Engineer",
  "description": "Matna Foods Limited is a leading agro-allied food processing company focused on the production of high-quality, food-grade cassava starch for both local and international markets. Nigeria&rsquo;s pioneer producer of international-standard, multi-use cassava starch, Matna operates a modern processing facility near Akure, Ondo State, strategically located within a major cassava-producing belt.

Matna&rsquo;s operations are anchored on strong process discipline, rigorous quality control, safety standards, and operational excellence required to meet demanding global specifications. By combining advanced processing technology, deep agricultural linkages, and skilled professionals, the company consistently delivers reliable, high-grade starch for a wide range of food and industrial applications.
Driven by a commitment to quality, innovation, and continuous improvement, Matna&rsquo;s products remain highly competitive across domestic and export markets. The company&rsquo;s growth has been guided by visionary leadership and a strong belief in the potential of Nigeria&rsquo;s agricultural value chain&mdash;earning industry recognition, including the CBN Export Category Best SMEEIS Entrepreneur Award. At Matna, we are committed to building a high-performance culture that attracts, develops, and empowers talented professionals who share our passion for excellence, collaboration, and innovation&mdash;creating an environment where ideas thrive, and standards are continually raised.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ekiti

Job Description


	Matna Foods is seeking a skilled and proactive Electrical Technician to join our technical team.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for installing, maintaining, and repairing electrical systems and industrial machinery within our processing plant.
	You will play a critical role in minimizing production downtime by ensuring all electrical equipment operates safely and efficiently.
	We are seeking talented professionals who are passionate about socio-economic development through agricultural and Agro-allied investments


Responsibilities


	Execute scheduled maintenance on industrial motors, transformers, generators (especially high-capacity CAT/Perkins units), and control panels.
	Diagnose and repair electrical faults in production lines, including cassava processing machinery, boilers, and packaging equipment.
	Maintain and troubleshoot Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs), Variable Frequency Drives (VFDs), and sensors.
	Install new electrical components, wiring, and lighting systems in accordance with industrial safety standards.
	Ensure all electrical work complies with Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) and food safety (HACCP) standards to prevent contamination or workplace hazards.
	Maintain accurate logs of repairs, part replacements, and energy consumption data.
	Work closely with the mechanical maintenance team to solve complex electromechanical issues on the factory floor.


Qualifications


	B. Sc or HND in Electrical/Electronic Engineering or a related technical field. NABTEB or Trade Test I, II, III certification is an added advantage.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in an industrial manufacturing environment (preferably food &amp; beverage or agro-allied).
	Deep understanding of 3-phase power distribution.
	Ability to read and interpret electrical circuit diagrams and blueprints.
	Experience with star-delta starters and industrial motor control.
	Strong problem-solving abilities, physical stamina for factory work, and the ability to work effectively under pressure during plant breakdowns.
	Willingness to work in shifts, including weekends or night shifts as required by production schedules.


Benefits


	Competitive Compensation. &nbsp;&nbsp;
	5-day workweek. &nbsp;&nbsp;
	Competitive Health Insurance (Employee + Spouse + 4 children). &nbsp;&nbsp;
	Wellness Programs &nbsp;&nbsp;
	Employee Training Programs &nbsp;&nbsp;
	Growth and Development &nbsp;&nbsp;
	Mentoring and Counseling.

Electrical Engineer Job at Matna Foods Limited




        
    

        
        Matna Foods Limited is a leading agro-allied food processing company focused on the production of high-quality, food-grade cassava starch for both local and international markets. Nigeria’s pioneer producer of international-standard, multi-use cassava starch, Matna operates a modern processing facility near Akure, Ondo State, strategically located within a major cassava-producing belt.
     

            
    



Matna’s operations are anchored on strong process discipline, rigorous quality control, safety standards, and operational excellence required to meet demanding global specifications. By combining advanced processing technology, deep agricultural linkages, and skilled professionals, the company consistently delivers reliable, high-grade starch for a wide range of food and industrial applications.
Driven by a commitment to quality, innovation, and continuous improvement, Matna’s products remain highly competitive across domestic and export markets. The company’s growth has been guided by visionary leadership and a strong belief in the potential of Nigeria’s agricultural value chain—earning industry recognition, including the CBN Export Category Best SMEEIS Entrepreneur Award. At Matna, we are committed to building a high-performance culture that attracts, develops, and empowers talented professionals who share our passion for excellence, collaboration, and innovation—creating an environment where ideas thrive, and standards are continually raised.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineer

Job Location: Ekiti

Job Description


	Matna Foods is seeking a skilled and proactive Electrical Technician to join our technical team.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for installing, maintaining, and repairing electrical systems and industrial machinery within our processing plant.
	You will play a critical role in minimizing production downtime by ensuring all electrical equipment operates safely and efficiently.
	We are seeking talented professionals who are passionate about socio-economic development through agricultural and Agro-allied investments


Responsibilities


	Execute scheduled maintenance on industrial motors, transformers, generators (especially high-capacity CAT/Perkins units), and control panels.
	Diagnose and repair electrical faults in production lines, including cassava processing machinery, boilers, and packaging equipment.
	Maintain and troubleshoot Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs), Variable Frequency Drives (VFDs), and sensors.
	Install new electrical components, wiring, and lighting systems in accordance with industrial safety standards.
	Ensure all electrical work complies with Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) and food safety (HACCP) standards to prevent contamination or workplace hazards.
	Maintain accurate logs of repairs, part replacements, and energy consumption data.
	Work closely with the mechanical maintenance team to solve complex electromechanical issues on the factory floor.


Qualifications


	B. Sc or HND in Electrical/Electronic Engineering or a related technical field. NABTEB or Trade Test I, II, III certification is an added advantage.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in an industrial manufacturing environment (preferably food & beverage or agro-allied).
	Deep understanding of 3-phase power distribution.
	Ability to read and interpret electrical circuit diagrams and blueprints.
	Experience with star-delta starters and industrial motor control.
	Strong problem-solving abilities, physical stamina for factory work, and the ability to work effectively under pressure during plant breakdowns.
	Willingness to work in shifts, including weekends or night shifts as required by production schedules.


Benefits


	Competitive Compensation.   
	5-day workweek.   
	Competitive Health Insurance (Employee + Spouse + 4 children).   
	Wellness Programs   
	Employee Training Programs   
	Growth and Development   
	Mentoring and Counseling.

Brand / Marketing Officer Job at Soft Intelligent Machines Limited




        
    

        
        At Soft Intelligent Machines Limited, We are team of professionals and technical specialists from wide ranging backgrounds. We combine the capacity for promoting businesses, delivering services and building organizations as wellas strengthening their systems and have sustained our reputation for improving organizational cultures And business outcomes. Our charter is to focus on evolving innovative solutions for change at affordable costs.
     

            
    



Soft Intelligent Machines (SIM) helps each client determine an achievable course of action that aligns with its current and future business priorities. By effectively managing portfolios of ICT issues for optimum results, our clients gain a unique source of competitive advantage and the ability to thrive in a dynamic business environment. We help our clients to focus on doing the right things that result in immediate business impact. We provide a range of customized solutions that ranges from: Business applications , core infrastructure , systems and storages, datacenters, Security solutions, enterprise wide communication and networking. Our in-depth industry knowledge and technical expertise , flexible delivery models help customers harness the best out of their IT investments by creating a reliable and scalable infrastructure.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Brand / Marketing Officer
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Soft Intelligent Machines is seeking a creative and results-driven Brand & Marketing Officer to develop, implement, and manage marketing strategies that strengthen brand visibility, drive customer engagement, and support business growth.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for maintaining brand consistency across all channels while executing effective marketing campaigns. Female candidates are strongly encouraged to apply.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement marketing and branding strategies aligned with the company’s objectives.
	Manage brand identity and ensure consistency across all marketing materials and communication channels.
	Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns across social media, email, website, and other platforms.
	Create, review, and coordinate marketing content including graphics, copy, presentations, and promotional materials.
	Conduct market research to identify trends, customer needs, and competitive positioning.
	Collaborate with sales to support lead generation and customer acquisition.


Requirements


	Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Mass Communication, Business Administration, or a related field.
	0 - 2 years of experience in marketing, branding, or digital marketing (entry-level candidates with strong portfolios are encouraged to apply).
	Strong understanding of branding, digital marketing, and customer engagement strategies.
	Excellent communication, writing, and presentation skills.
	Self-motivated, eager to learn, and willing to grow within a fast-paced environment.
	Knowledge of social media management tools is an advantage.
	Skilled in using Canva and Adobe tools for marketing and brand visuals.


Benefits


	This role offers a motivated graduate the opportunity to build a career in brand and marketing, contributing to brand development and marketing campaigns while receiving structured training and mentorship.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to: christianah@softintelligentmachines.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "title": "Project Manager",
  "description": "Ralds &amp; Agate (R&amp;A) is an Organizational Effectiveness Firm focused on providing People and Process related solutions to businesses, communities and organizations within and outside Africa. We bring to the table a versatile &amp; cumulative business and professional experience of over 4 decades. Multifaceted industry experience across Oil &amp; Gas, Research &amp; Technology, Hospitality, Manufacturing, Financial services etc.We work to support C suite clients to ensure that they derive value from their very valuable asset: their Employees. We are focused and committed towards building partnerships and mutually beneficial long term relationships with our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Mission / Purpose of the Job


	The Project Manager role is responsible for planning, coordinating, and delivering projects within approved budgets, timelines, and quality standards.
	The Project Manager ensures efficient utilization of resources, effective stakeholder coordination, and compliance with technical, safety, and quality requirements.
	The role also provides leadership, mentorship, and performance oversight to project teams to ensure successful project execution and client satisfaction.


Job Responsibilities
Project Planning:


	Prepare Budget and time schedules for Projects
	Ensure the profitable &amp; timely execution of projects on hand by planning &amp; effective utilization of available resources
	Coordinates Project Design Drawings, Shop Drawings, and &ldquo;As fitted&rdquo; drawings as required
	To ensure the assessment of the approved vendor.


Financial Management:


	Monitors and controls allocation of Company Resources for effective, efficient and timely service delivery.
	Adheres strictly to strict Cost Monitoring Procedure
	Ensures provision of necessary resources for Project Delivery
	Evaluates new vendors for their Technical Capabilities.


Project /Site Coordination:


	Provides Technical Evaluation of Sub-contractors and commercial inputs
	Coordinates and conducts site meetings
	Documents and implements a detailed Quality Control procedure for all incoming materials.
	Delegates authority and ensures subordinates are adequately engaged.
	Ensures cordial relationships with Clients.


Project Reporting:


	Creates effective communication and feedback systems for interfaces
	Submits bi-monthly report to client and monthly overall project report to the CEO.


Project Monitoring:


	Monitors progress of Projects and resolves all Project matters timely
	Measures Performance of Subordinates.


Project Implementation:


	Manages unforeseen crisis to ensure successful Project execution.


Training:


	Impacts necessary training and skills to subordinates.


Project Design:


	Co-ordinates Developments of Bill of Quantities for Projects from shop drawings and from consultant drawings for the Purpose of Tendering
	Supervise the draughting of drawings for all Projects


Tendering &amp; Business Development:


	Active participation in Bid Tendering and Sourcing for New Projects
	Develop a template for commercial/ Financial bids for materials for bidding.


Job Specifications: Minimum &amp; Preferred Requirements
Education / Business Degree:


	HND or Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related discipline (minimum Upper Credit / Second Class Upper).
	Project Management Professional (PMP)
	COREN registration
	Nigerian Society of Engineers (NSE) membership.


Work Experience:


	Minimum of 5&ndash;8 years of B2B sales experience, with at least 3&ndash;5 years in cybersecurity or technology services sales.
	Proven track record of closing complex, consultative deals in cybersecurity, MSSP, or enterprise technology.
	Experience managing mid-market and enterprise customer.


Work Experience


	10 years post-qualification experience


Competencies, Skills &amp; Attributes
Knowledge:


	Project management methodologies and best practices.
	Engineering project execution and site coordination.
	Budgeting, cost control, and financial management.
	Quality management and risk management principles.
	Procurement and vendor management processes.


Skills:


	Project planning &amp; control
	Budgeting &amp; cost optimization
	Risk &amp; quality management
	Materials management
	Problem-solving &amp; decision-making
	Oral and written communication
	Team leadership &amp; coordination
	Performance monitoring
	Continuous improvement.


Behavioral Attributes:


	Strong leadership and accountability
	Results-oriented and performance-driven
	High attention to detail
	Ability to work under pressure
	Client-focused and professional
	Proactive and solution-oriented
	Strong interpersonal skills
	Integrity and reliability.
